DOC.brief_summary: The overall aim study determine whether UVB excimer laser treatment psoriasis affect serum inflammatory marker , assess hyperpigmentation erythema excimer laser treatment . The investigator hypothesize treatment psoriasis UVB deliver via 308 nm excimer laser decrease level serum inflammatory marker . The investigator hypothesize treatment decrease plaque erythema result minimal hyperpigmentation .
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects undergo Excimer treatment twice week reach PASI 75 improvement , reach maximum 20 total treatment . A blood draw ass serum inflammatory marker perform screen visit final visit . Chromameter assessment , photograph , PASI PGA ( Physician Global Assessment ) perform throughout study monitor psoriasis improvement , hyperpigmentation erythema .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 year old Male female diagnosis psoriasis Psoriasis involvement 515 % BSA Has systemic psoriasis therapy ( e.g . retinoids , methotrexate , biologic agent , etc ) least 4 week Has topical therapy ( e.g . calcipotriene , topical steroid ) least 2 week Fitzpatrick Skin Types IVI Active history photosensitivity ( e.g . xeroderma pigmentosum , lupus erythematosus , porphyria , severe polymorphous light eruption , solar urticaria ) Any suspicion psoriasis photosensitive variant . Any medical condition could aggravate may cause extreme discomfort study period .
